description: Alex Adams"The Axe"Ht: 5'10" WT: 180lbs Season W/L record ( 0-3)Doug Acre"The Destroyer"Ht: 5'6" WT: 150lbsSeason W/L record (2-0) The elimination rounds of Naked Kombat's Summer Smackdown Tournament are coming to a close as Doug "The Destroyer" Acre takes on "The Axe" Alex Adams. The Axe is hoping to get his first win and show The Destroyer what his winner cock tastes like before fucking him from behind. As the match begins The Destroyer quickly takes The Axe to the ground, locking him up and racking in the points. The Axe throws him off and charges with full force, only to receive a suplex from The Destroyer. The Axe recovers quickly though, locking The Destroyer up in a full nelson. The Destroyer's eyes are fixed on victory as he's relentless in his use of face-sitting and leg cradles. There's only one more spot left in the quarter finals, who has the drive to outlast their opponent, fighting and fucking all the way to victory?
title: Naked Kombat's Summer Smackdown Tournament - Final Elimination Match!
